title: iBoostUp 9.8 – Optimize your Mac, fix slow performance, fix app errors
content: iBoostUp is a system optimizer that monitors and corrects system performance problems. It tunes up and optimizes your Mac by purging unneeded files, fixing your hard disk, giving you performance recommendations, protecting your privacy by removing cookies, displaying system information and much more!   Version 9.8: Improvements to Quick Clean (Blender) and Spyware Doctor.   […]

title: ATOM RPG Trudograd 1.04 – A turn-based post-apocalyptic roleplaying game
content: Trudograd is a stand-alone story expansion to ATOM RPG – a turn-based roleplaying game set in post-apocalyptic Soviet Union.   It is inspired by classic cRPG titles of the past, such as early Fallout, Wasteland and Baldur’s Gate series.   22 years ago the USSR and the Western Bloc destroyed each other in a nuclear […]

title: NEOVERSE 16.124 – Turn-Based Game With Thrilling Challenges
content: Neoverse is a beautiful, fantastic game consisting of adventures with thrilling challenges. It is a strategic, action, rogue-lite, deck building game that will test the player’s skill. title: Punk Wars 1.1.0 – Turn-Based Strategy Game

title: CloudMounter 3.11 – System utility that mounts web servers as local disks
content: CloudMounter makes it easy for you to use multiple cloud storage services by allowing you to access and manage their data through a single window. It mounts OneDrive, Google Drive, Amazon S3 and Dropbox accounts as additional hard drives on your Mac. The app also enables you to connect to FTP, SFTP, FTPS and WebDAV […]
